mapper.sql: a.booking_no, a.act_no, a.act_type, a.booking_qty, a.site_id, a.order_no, a.domain, a.dept_id, e.dept_name, a.cr_user, isnull(f.chn_nm, a.cr_user) cr_user_name, a.cr_time, a.md_user, a.md_time, a.wh_id, a.mat_no, case a.act_type when 1 then b.status when 2 then cast(c.status as varchar(50)) when 3 then cast(d.inv_tran_audit_status as varchar(50)) end status, case a.act_type when 1 then (select name from TB_SYS_LOOKUP where type = 'INV_MR_STATUS' and code = b.status) when 2 then (select name from TB_SYS_LOOKUP where type = 'INV_TR_STATUS' and code = cast(c.status as varchar(50))) when 3 then (select name from TB_SYS_LOOKUP where type = 'INV_TR_STATUS' and code = cast(d.inv_tran_audit_status as varchar(50))) end status_dscr
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from TB_INV_BOOKING a left join TB_INV_MATERIAL_OPT b on b.opt_type = 'MRQ' and b.opt_id = a.act_no left join TB_INV_TR c on c.tr_no = a.act_no left join TB_INV_STAT_TRAN d on d.inv_tran_no = a.act_no left join TB_ORG_DEPT e on e.dept_id = a.dept_id left join TB_AUTH_PERSONNEL f on f.psn_no = a.cr_user
order by ${orderByClause}

select
from TB_INV_BOOKING a left join TB_INV_MATERIAL_OPT b on b.opt_type = 'MRQ' and b.opt_id = a.act_no left join TB_INV_TR c on c.tr_no = a.act_no left join TB_INV_STAT_TRAN d on d.inv_tran_no = a.act_no left join TB_ORG_DEPT e on e.dept_id = a.dept_id left join TB_AUTH_PERSONNEL f on f.psn_no = a.cr_user where a.booking_no = #{booking_no,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into TB_INV_BOOKING (booking_no, act_no, act_type, booking_qty, site_id, order_no, domain, dept_id, cr_user, cr_time, md_user, md_time, wh_id, mat_no) values (#{booking_no,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{act_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{act_type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{booking_qty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{site_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{order_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{domain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dept_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cr_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cr_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{md_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{md_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{wh_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mat_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into TB_INV_BOOKING
booking_no,
act_no,
act_type,
booking_qty,
site_id,
order_no,
domain,
dept_id,
cr_user,
cr_time,
md_user,
md_time,
wh_id,
mat_no,

mapper.update:
update TB_INV_BOOKING
booking_no = #{record.booking_no,jdbcType=BIGINT},
act_no = #{record.act_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
act_type = #{record.act_type,jdbcType=TINYINT},
booking_qty = #{record.booking_qty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
site_id = #{record.site_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_no = #{record.order_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
domain = #{record.domain,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dept_id = #{record.dept_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cr_user = #{record.cr_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cr_time = #{record.cr_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
md_user = #{record.md_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
md_time = #{record.md_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
wh_id = #{record.wh_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mat_no = #{record.mat_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update TB_INV_BOOKING set booking_no = #{record.booking_no,jdbcType=BIGINT}, act_no = #{record.act_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, act_type = #{record.act_type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, booking_qty = #{record.booking_qty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, site_id = #{record.site_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_no = #{record.order_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, domain = #{record.domain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dept_id = #{record.dept_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cr_user = #{record.cr_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cr_time = #{record.cr_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, md_user = #{record.md_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, md_time = #{record.md_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, wh_id = #{record.wh_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mat_no = #{record.mat_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update TB_INV_BOOKING
act_no = #{act_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
act_type = #{act_type,jdbcType=TINYINT},
booking_qty = #{booking_qty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
site_id = #{site_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_no = #{order_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
domain = #{domain,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dept_id = #{dept_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cr_user = #{cr_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cr_time = #{cr_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
md_user = #{md_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
md_time = #{md_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
wh_id = #{wh_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mat_no = #{mat_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where booking_no = #{booking_no,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update TB_INV_BOOKING set act_no = #{act_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, act_type = #{act_type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, booking_qty = #{booking_qty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, site_id = #{site_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_no = #{order_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, domain = #{domain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dept_id = #{dept_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cr_user = #{cr_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cr_time = #{cr_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, md_user = #{md_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, md_time = #{md_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, wh_id = #{wh_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mat_no = #{mat_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where booking_no = #{booking_no,jdbcType=BIGINT}
UPDATE TB_INV_BOOKING SET booking_qty = (booking_qty-#{qty}) WHERE act_type = '1' AND act_no = #{optId} AND mat_no = #{matNo} AND wh_id = #{whId}
UPDATE TB_INV_BOOKING SET booking_qty = (booking_qty-#{appQty}) WHERE act_type = '2' AND mat_no = #{matNo} AND wh_id = #{whId} AND ACT_NO=#{trNo}
